TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FrameworkPropertyMetadata extends System.Windows.UIPropertyMetadata

summary.span: 为依赖属性报告或应用元数据（从而专门添加特定于框架的属性系统特征）。

span.span: Reports or applies metadata for a dependency property, specifically adding framework-specific property system characteristics.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类派生自(通过)。This class derives from (through ) . 对于大多数 WPF 框架级别的应用程序开发目的，是用于依赖项属性的元数据的类型，而不是基本元数据类型或。For most WPF framework-level application development purposes, is the type used for dependency property metadata, rather than the base metadata types or . 这是为现有依赖项属性和大多数自定义的依赖项属性的情况下，则返回 true。This is true both for existing dependency properties and for most custom dependency property scenarios. 此声明的成员类用于补充基类包括各种指定或报告如属性继承、 数据绑定和布局的 WPF 框架级别属性系统行为的布尔属性。The members declared by this class that supplement the base class include various Boolean properties that specify or report WPF framework-level property system behavior such as property inheritance, data binding, and layout. 用于创建多个构造函数签名实例 take参数。Several constructor signatures for creating a instance take a parameter. 枚举仅用于在构造函数中，指定初始的行为，否则不公开后构造。The enumeration is used only to specify initial behavior in the constructor, and is not otherwise exposed after is constructed. 在构造实例中，你可以获取或设置通过共享的名称的构造函数调用中使用的枚举值的各种属性的相应信息。From a constructed instance, you can get or set the corresponding information through various properties that share the name of the enumeration values used in the constructor call. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 在不常使用此类[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。This class is not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的示例获取依赖属性元数据的特定所有者作为初始基类型。The following example gets metadata for a dependency property on a particular owner as the initial base type. 该元数据被强制转换为。That metadata is cast to . 如果强制转换返回有效，然后各种通过 （未显示） 的简单 UI 报告的属性值。If the cast returned a valid , then various property values are reported through a simple UI (not shown). [!code-csharp[PropertySystemEsoterics#DPGetMetadataSingle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertySystemEsoterics/CSharp/XAMLAPP/page2.xaml.cs#dpgetmetadatasingle)] [!code-vb[PropertySystemEsoterics#DPGetMetadataSingle](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertySystemEsoterics/visualbasic/xamlapp/page2.xaml.vb#dpgetmetadatasingle)] [!code-csharp[PropertySystemEsoterics#FPMProperties](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertySystemEsoterics/CSharp/XAMLAPP/page2.xaml.cs#fpmproperties)] [!code-vb[PropertySystemEsoterics#FPMProperties](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertySystemEsoterics/visualbasic/xamlapp/page2.xaml.vb#fpmproperties)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为提供的值的类型`defaultValue`必须匹配或与此元数据将应用于依赖项属性的原始注册中指定的类型。The type of the value provided for `defaultValue` must match or be related to the type specified in the original registration of the dependency property that this metadata will be applied to. 在编译期间不能检测到不匹配，是因为，则可能很难调试，元数据默认值类型和应用于依赖项属性的类型之间的不匹配。Mismatches between metadata default value type and the type of the dependency property it is being applied to can be difficult to debug, because the mismatch is not detectable during compilation. 属性系统不会运行时，直到计算的属性的有效值，因此默认值类型/属性类型不匹配的结果为运行时错误。The property system does not evaluate the effective value of a property until run time, so the result of a default value type/property type mismatch is a run-time error. 值在属性系统中具有特殊含义，并且不能用作依赖项属性默认值。The value has special meaning in the property system, and cannot be used as a dependency property default value. ## Examples 下面的示例调用此构造函数签名：The following example calls this constructor signature: [!code-csharp[PropertyMetadataAPIs#Initfpm](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMetadataAPIs/CSharp/Class1.cs#initfpm)] [!code-csharp[PropertyMetadataAPIs#FPMCtor1param](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMetadataAPIs/CSharp/Class1.cs#fpmctor1param)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为提供的值的类型`defaultValue`必须匹配或与此元数据将应用于依赖项属性的原始注册中指定的类型。The type of the value provided for `defaultValue` must match or be related to the type specified in the original registration of the dependency property that this metadata will be applied to. 在编译期间不能检测到不匹配，是因为，则可能很难调试，元数据默认值类型和应用于依赖项属性的类型之间的不匹配。Mismatches between metadata default value type and the type of the dependency property it is being applied to can be difficult to debug, because the mismatch is not detectable during compilation. 属性系统不会运行时，直到计算的属性的有效值，因此默认值类型/属性类型不匹配的结果为运行时错误。The property system does not evaluate the effective value of a property until run time, so the result of a default value type/property type mismatch is a run-time error. 值在属性系统中具有特殊含义，并且不能用作依赖项属性默认值。The value has special meaning in the property system, and cannot be used as a dependency property default value. 值标记为设置标志`flags`参数将设置的布尔值相匹配的属性标志的名称与`true`。Values marked as set flags in the `flags` parameter will set the Boolean value of properties that match that flag's name to `true`. 只要元数据具有尚未应用到特定的属性系统操作，你随后可以更改的元数据中的属性的值。You can subsequently change the values of the properties in the metadata, as long as the metadata has not yet been applied to a specific property system operation. ## Examples 下面的示例调用此构造函数签名：The following example calls this constructor signature: [!code-csharp[PropertyMetadataAPIs#Initfpm](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMetadataAPIs/CSharp/Class1.cs#initfpm)] [!code-csharp[PropertyMetadataAPIs#FPMCtor_DV_FPMO](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMetadataAPIs/CSharp/Class1.cs#fpmctor_dv_fpmo)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为提供的值的类型`defaultValue`必须匹配或与此元数据将应用于依赖项属性的原始注册中指定的类型。The type of the value provided for `defaultValue` must match or be related to the type specified in the original registration of the dependency property that this metadata will be applied to. 在编译期间不能检测到不匹配，是因为，则可能很难调试，元数据默认值类型和应用于依赖项属性的类型之间的不匹配。Mismatches between metadata default value type and the type of the dependency property it is being applied to can be difficult to debug, because the mismatch is not detectable during compilation. 属性系统不会运行时，直到计算的属性的有效值，因此默认值类型/属性类型不匹配的结果为运行时错误。The property system does not evaluate the effective value of a property until run time, so the result of a default value type/property type mismatch is a run-time error. 值在属性系统中具有特殊含义，并且不能用作依赖项属性默认值。The value has special meaning in the property system, and cannot be used as a dependency property default value. 值标记为设置标志`flags`参数将设置的布尔值相匹配的属性标志的名称与`true`。Values marked as set flags in the `flags` parameter will set the Boolean value of properties that match that flag's name to `true`. 只要元数据具有尚未应用到特定的属性系统操作，你仍可更改的元数据中的属性的值。You can still change the values of the properties in the metadata, as long as the metadata has not yet been applied to a specific property system operation. ## Examples 下面的示例调用此构造函数签名：The following example calls this constructor signature: [!code-csharp[PropertyMetadataAPIs#Initfpm](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMetadataAPIs/CSharp/Class1.cs#initfpm)] [!code-csharp[PropertyMetadataAPIs#FPMCtor_DV_FPMO_PCC_CVC](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMetadataAPIs/CSharp/Class1.cs#fpmctor_dv_fpmo_pcc_cvc)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为提供的值的类型`defaultValue`必须匹配或与此元数据将应用于依赖项属性的原始注册中指定的类型。The type of the value provided for `defaultValue` must match or be related to the type specified in the original registration of the dependency property that this metadata will be applied to. 在编译期间不能检测到不匹配，是因为，则可能很难调试，元数据默认值类型和应用于依赖项属性的类型之间的不匹配。Mismatches between metadata default value type and the type of the dependency property it is being applied to can be difficult to debug, because the mismatch is not detectable during compilation. 属性系统不会运行时，直到计算的属性的有效值，因此默认值类型/属性类型不匹配的结果为运行时错误。The property system does not evaluate the effective value of a property until run time, so the result of a default value type/property type mismatch is a run-time error. 值在属性系统中具有特殊含义，并且不能用作依赖项属性默认值。The value has special meaning in the property system, and cannot be used as a dependency property default value. `isAnimationProhibited`参数设置的初始值属性声明由即时基类类。The `isAnimationProhibited` parameter sets the initial value of the property declared by the immediate base class. 有关绑定的更新源行为的详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For more information about the update source behavior for bindings, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). 值标记为设置标志`flags`参数将设置的布尔值相匹配的属性标志的名称与`true`。Values marked as set flags in the `flags` parameter will set the Boolean value of properties that match that flag's name to `true`. 只要元数据具有尚未应用到特定的属性系统操作，你仍可更改的元数据中的属性的值。You can still change the values of the properties in the metadata, as long as the metadata has not yet been applied to a specific property system operation. ## Examples [!code-csharp[PropertyMetadataAPIs#Initfpm](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMetadataAPIs/CSharp/Class1.cs#initfpm)] [!code-csharp[PropertyMetadataAPIs#FPMCtor_DV_FPMO_PCC_CVC_IAP_DUST](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMetadataAPIs/CSharp/Class1.cs#fpmctor_dv_fpmo_pcc_cvc_iap_dust)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示依赖属性是否会影响布局引擎操作期间的排列过程。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a dependency property potentially affects the arrange pass during layout engine operations.

value.span: 如果此元数据所在的依赖项对象可能会影响排列处理过程，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the dependency property on which this metadata exists potentially affects the arrange pass; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和包括的实现监视对元素存在的所有依赖项属性的有效值更改。 and include an implementation of that monitors effective value changes to all dependency properties that exist on an element. 作为该逻辑的一部分，更改有效值的依赖项属性值，并且具有与元数据设置为`true`将启动推迟的请求，以使该元素的可视内容无效 (调用)。As part of that logic, dependency properties that change effective value and have metadata with set to `true` will initiate a deferred request to invalidate the visuals for that element (a call to ). 因为此 WPF 框架级别实现已就位，你通常不需要的依赖项属性与看起来除非大体上为你要替换或修改的 WPF 框架级别布局行为。Because this WPF framework-level implementation is already in place, you typically do not need to look for dependency properties with unless you are substantially replacing or modifying the WPF framework-level layout behavior. 自定义实现可以选择具有类似的行为更改依赖项属性的其中是`true`。Custom implementations might choose to have similar behavior for dependency property changes where is `true`. 在派生类的属性通常定义为读写模式的对象模型中。Properties on derived classes of are typically defined in the object model as read-write. 这是以便可以在实例初始化后对它们进行调整。This is so they can be adjusted after initialization of the instance. 但是，作为对的调用的一部分使用元数据后， ，或、 属性系统将密封该元数据实例和传达的元数据的特性的属性都被视为不可变。However, after the metadata is consumed as part of a call to , , or , the property system will seal that metadata instance and properties that convey the specifics of the metadata are now considered immutable. 正在尝试设置此属性后的是`true`对此元数据实例将引发的异常。Attempting to set this property after is `true` on this metadata instance will raise an exception. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 此类的成员通常不是使用在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。Members of this class are either not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的示例从各种依赖项属性字段中获取的默认元数据，查询的各种值属性，并使用这些信息来填充表，以实现"元数据浏览器"。The following example obtains the default metadata from various dependency property fields, queries the value of various properties on it, and uses the information to populate a table to implement a "metadata browser". [!code-csharp[PropertySystemEsoterics#DPGetMetadataSingle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertySystemEsoterics/CSharp/XAMLAPP/page2.xaml.cs#dpgetmetadatasingle)] [!code-vb[PropertySystemEsoterics#DPGetMetadataSingle](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertySystemEsoterics/visualbasic/xamlapp/page2.xaml.vb#dpgetmetadatasingle)] [!code-csharp[PropertySystemEsoterics#FPMProperties](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertySystemEsoterics/CSharp/XAMLAPP/page2.xaml.cs#fpmproperties)] [!code-vb[PropertySystemEsoterics#FPMProperties](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertySystemEsoterics/visualbasic/xamlapp/page2.xaml.vb#fpmproperties)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和包括的实现监视对元素存在的所有依赖项属性的有效值更改。 and include an implementation of that monitors effective value changes to all dependency properties that exist on an element. 作为该逻辑的一部分，更改有效值的依赖项属性值，并且具有与元数据设置为`true`将启动推迟的请求，以使其无效的父元素的视觉对象。As part of that logic, dependency properties that change effective value and have metadata with set to `true` will initiate a deferred request to invalidate the visuals for the parent element. 通常情况下，你不需要的报告更改属性设置为父元素使用因为元素本身可能已将其自己作为`true`。Generally, you do not need to report changes of a property to a parent element using because the element itself would already have its own as `true`. 这是通常足够，因为子元素中的更改通常启动父排列在适当的时候。That is usually sufficient, because changes in the child element generally initiate a parent arrange when appropriate. 有时用于派生类。 is sometimes used for a derived class. 在此情况下，子元素设置了一个属性，但一个派生的类不控制其自己的呈现。In this case, the child element sets a property, but a derived class does not control its own rendering. 呈现由用作内容主机的父元素。The rendering is handled by a parent element that serves as the content host. 例如，对的值的更改才遭到一个子元素的附加的属性失效排列的父级，因为必须更改该子级的父代中的位置。For instance, a change to the value of the attached property by a child element invalidates arrange of the parent, because the position of the child in the parent must be changed. 因此，附加的属性具有元数据位置是`true`。Therefore, the attached property has metadata where is `true`. 另一个示例是; 如果此属性更改，父可能会更改的子级，具体取决于可用空间的位置。Another example is ; when this property changes, the parent might change the positioning of the child, depending on available space. 因为此 WPF 框架级别实现已就位，你通常不需要的依赖项属性与看起来除非大体上为你要替换或修改的 WPF 框架级别布局行为。Because this WPF framework-level implementation is already in place, you typically do not need to look for dependency properties with unless you are substantially replacing or modifying the WPF framework-level layout behavior. 自定义实现可以选择具有类似的行为更改依赖项属性的其中是`true`。Custom implementations might choose to have similar behavior for dependency property changes where is `true`. 属性对任何派生类的通常定义为读写模式的对象模型中。Properties on any derived classes of are typically defined in the object model as read-write. 这是以便可以在实例初始化后对它们进行调整。This is so they can be adjusted after initialization of the instance. 但是，作为对的调用的一部分使用元数据后， ，或、 属性系统将密封该元数据实例和传达的元数据的特性的属性都被视为不可变。However, after the metadata is consumed as part of a call to , , or , the property system will seal that metadata instance and properties that convey the specifics of the metadata are now considered immutable. 正在尝试设置此属性后的是`true`对此元数据实例将引发的异常。Attempting to set this property after is `true` on this metadata instance will raise an exception. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 此类的成员通常不使用在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。Members of this class are not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值继承是一项功能的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]在 WPF 框架级别，凭此某些依赖项属性可以是本地一个元素设置处或附近的根的属性系统[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]元素树，然后将它们由继承的值此外拥有该属性的子元素的逻辑树中的所有元素。Property value inheritance is a feature of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] property system at the WPF framework level, whereby certain dependency properties can be locally set on an element at or near the root of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] element tree and then have their value inherited by all elements within the logical tree of child elements that also possess that property. 默认情况下，未启用属性值继承和启用它确实有一些性能影响。Property value inheritance is not enabled by default, and enabling it does have some performance implications. 有关详细信息，请参阅[属性值继承](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/property-value-inheritance.md)。For details, see [Property Value Inheritance](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/property-value-inheritance.md). > [!NOTE] > 虽然可能会出现属性值继承，使其适用于非附加依赖项属性，但通过在运行时树中某些对象对象部门的附加属性的继承行为不确定。Although property value inheritance might appear to work for nonattached dependency properties, the inheritance behavior for a nonattached property through certain object-object divisions in the runtime tree is undefined. 始终使用注册你在其中指定的属性的元数据中。Always use to register properties where you specify in the metadata. 在派生类的属性通常定义为读写模式的对象模型中。Properties on derived classes of are typically defined in the object model as read-write. 这是以便可以在实例初始化后对它们进行调整。This is so they can be adjusted after initialization of the instance. 但是，作为对的调用的一部分使用元数据后， ，或、 属性系统将密封该元数据实例和传达的元数据的特性的属性都被视为不可变。However, after the metadata is consumed as part of a call to , , or , the property system will seal that metadata instance and properties that convey the specifics of the metadata are now considered immutable. 正在尝试设置此属性后的是`true`对此元数据实例将引发的异常。Attempting to set this property after is `true` on this metadata instance will raise an exception. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 此类的成员通常不使用在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。Members of this class are not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的示例从各种依赖项属性字段中获取的默认元数据，查询的各种值属性，并使用这些信息来填充表，以实现"元数据浏览器"。The following example obtains the default metadata from various dependency property fields, queries the value of various properties on it, and uses the information to populate a table to implement a "metadata browser". remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性报告`false`两个可能的条件之一： 不能使用任一数据绑定到依赖项属性，因为依赖项属性 （作为中报告的依赖项属性标识符，不是元数据），以只读的或的值另一个元数据属性， ，设置为`true`此元数据中。This property reports `false` for one of two possible conditions: either data binding to a dependency property is not allowed because the dependency property is read-only (as reported in the dependency property identifier, not the metadata), or the value of another metadata property, , is set to `true` in this metadata. 此属性公开为方便起见，以便调用方不需要同时检查和。This property is exposed as a convenience so that callers do not have to check both and . 如果你尝试创建指定否则为的读/写属性不应支持数据绑定的元数据，请指定标志(请注意与细微的命名约定差别在于)。If you are attempting to create metadata that specifies that an otherwise read/write property should not support data binding, specify the flag (note the slight naming convention difference versus ). ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 此类的成员通常不使用在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。Members of this class are not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的示例从各种依赖项属性字段中获取的默认元数据，查询的各种值属性，并使用这些信息来填充表，以实现"元数据浏览器"。The following example obtains the default metadata from various dependency property fields, queries the value of various properties on it, and uses the information to populate a table to implement a "metadata browser". [!code-csharp[PropertySystemEsoterics#DPGetMetadataSingle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertySystemEsoterics/CSharp/XAMLAPP/page2.xaml.cs#dpgetmetadatasingle)] [!code-vb[PropertySystemEsoterics#DPGetMetadataSingle](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertySystemEsoterics/visualbasic/xamlapp/page2.xaml.vb#dpgetmetadatasingle)] [!code-csharp[PropertySystemEsoterics#FPMProperties](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertySystemEsoterics/CSharp/XAMLAPP/page2.xaml.cs#fpmproperties)] [!code-vb[PropertySystemEsoterics#FPMProperties](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertySystemEsoterics/visualbasic/xamlapp/page2.xaml.vb#fpmproperties)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，此元数据属性设置为`true`专用于不应支持数据绑定，尽管要读写属性的属性。Note that this metadata property is set to `true` specifically for properties that should not support data binding, despite being read-write properties. 应当是，在大多数情况下，依赖项属性的声明位置，则需要数据绑定，因为数据绑定是依赖项属性是有用的重要方案之一。The expectation is that in most cases where a dependency property is declared, data binding is desired, because data binding is one of the key scenarios where a dependency property is useful. 与不同，这不会只是更改更高版本可以更改特定绑定的默认值。Unlike , this does not merely change a default that can later be changed on a specific binding. 将此属性设置`true`元数据将依赖项属性的元数据中禁用应用到该依赖项属性的表达式通过其值的所有绑定。Setting this property `true` in the metadata for a dependency property metadata will disable all bindings from applying their values through expressions to that dependency property. 只读依赖属性不支持数据绑定 （因为它们具有可以应用更改后的值没有 setter），但是仍然会报告`false`为。Read-only dependency properties do not support data binding (because they have no setter that can apply changed values), but will still report `false` for . 这是因为属性，对应于值将报告与如何元数据的实际创建，而不是始终 reporting 命名的属性可能暗示的最终结果行为的奇偶校验。This is because properties that correspond to a values will report parity with how the metadata was actually established, rather than always reporting the end result behavior that the naming of the property might imply. 若要确定给定的依赖属性是否允许数据绑定，应经常检查相反。To determine whether a given dependency property permits data binding, you should usually check instead. 是一种便于同时检查和作为单个操作，以生成预期的结果。 is a convenience for checking both and as a single operation, yielding the expected result. 在派生类的属性通常定义为读写模式的对象模型中。Properties on derived classes of are typically defined in the object model as read-write. 这是以便可以在实例初始化后对它们进行调整。This is so they can be adjusted after initialization of the instance. 但是，作为对的调用的一部分使用元数据后， ，或、 属性系统将密封该元数据实例和传达的元数据的特性的属性都被视为不可变。However, after the metadata is consumed as part of a call to , , or , the property system will seal that metadata instance and properties that convey the specifics of the metadata are now considered immutable. 正在尝试设置此属性后的是`true`对此元数据实例将引发的异常。Attempting to set this property after is `true` on this metadata instance will raise an exception. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 此类的成员通常不使用在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。Members of this class are not typically used in remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写元数据时在内部使用此方法。This method is used internally when metadata is being overridden.

span.para: 派生自的类（或特别是此类） 应重写此方法，以考虑它们在其实现中添加任何元数据属性。例如，您的实现可能会添加新的标志枚举值，与实现应该能够正确组合这些标志。始终调用您自己的实现之前, 的基实现，因为基实现负责合并已在以前层次结构中的类型上定义的所有属性。通过添加行为中的实现在于特定 WPF 框架级别属性中的元数据，如中按位组合或操作。行为还实现行为，通过调用重写现有依赖项属性的属性元数据时。，使用重写元数据，即。

Classes that derive from (or this class particularly) should override this method to account for any metadata properties they have added in their implementations. For instance, your implementation might have added a new flagwise enumeration value, and the implementation should then be able to combine those flags correctly. Always call the base implementation prior to your own implementation, because the base implementation takes care of merging all the properties already defined on previous types in the hierarchy. The behavior added by the implementation in is that specific WPF framework-level properties in the metadata such as are combined in a bitwise or operation. The behavior also implements the behavior when you override the property metadata on an existing dependency property by calling ., using override metadata that is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此元数据跨特殊的父元素子级元素边界报告属性值继承行为的很少应用修改。This metadata reports a seldom-applied modification to property value inheritance behavior across special parent element-child element boundaries. 此类边界的典型示例是内容，其中可能获取内容重新加载独立是否存在于。The canonical example of such a boundary is the contents of a , where the content might get reloaded independently of the existence of the . 所需的属性系统行为是属性值继承应遍历到的内容，因为这些内容可能是托管帧的应用程序并不拥有或控制的元素。The desired property system behavior is that property value inheritance should not traverse into the contents of the , because these contents might be elements that the application hosting the frame does not own or control. 指定元数据与设置为`true`，并指定以及为作为`true`，将导致在其应用了元数据要甚至跨可继承的属性边界或类似的边界。Specifying metadata with set to `true`, as well as specifying as `true`, will cause the property on which the metadata is applied to be inheritable even across the boundary or similar boundaries. 在派生类的属性通常定义为读写模式的对象模型中。Properties on derived classes of are typically defined in the object model as read-write. 这是以便可以在实例初始化后对它们进行调整。This is so they can be adjusted after initialization of the instance. 但是，作为对的调用的一部分使用元数据后， ，或、 属性系统将密封该元数据实例和传达的元数据的特性的属性都被视为不可变。However, after the metadata is consumed as part of a call to , , or , the property system will seal that metadata instance and properties that convey the specifics of the metadata are now considered immutable. 正在尝试设置此属性后的是`true`对此元数据实例将引发的异常。Attempting to set this property after is `true` on this metadata instance will raise an exception. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 此类的成员通常不使用在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。Members of this class are not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此元数据选项是相关的是引用类型，其中该类型具有自己的属性值的依赖项属性。This metadata option is pertinent for dependency properties that are reference types, where that type has property values of its own. 通常情况下，布局系统逻辑是假定具有子属性的任何依赖属性可能将影响布局，因为检查所有子属性的更改是花费更多时间比实际运行另一个呈现处理。Typically, the layout system logic is to assume that any dependency property with sub-properties potentially will affect layout, because checking all sub-properties for changes is more time consuming than actually running another render pass. 将此选项设置为`true`可用于优化的 WPF 框架级别布局系统实现的性能。Setting this option to `true` is useful for optimizing performance of the WPF framework level layout system implementation. 在派生类的属性通常定义为读写模式的对象模型中。Properties on derived classes of are typically defined in the object model as read-write. 这是以便可以在实例初始化后对它们进行调整。This is so they can be adjusted after initialization of the instance. 但是，作为对的调用的一部分使用元数据后， ，或、 属性系统将密封该元数据实例和传达的元数据的特性的属性都被视为不可变。However, once the metadata is consumed as part of a call to , , or , the property system will seal that metadata instance and properties that convey the specifics of the metadata are now considered immutable. 正在尝试设置此属性后的是`true`对此元数据实例将引发的异常。Attempting to set this property after is `true` on this metadata instance will raise an exception. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 此类的成员通常不使用在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。Members of this class are not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
